venue.name: Jerry Remy's Sports Bar and Grill

item.description:
If you were one of the crazy eight who dared RSVP for this event, you were treated to open bar, complimentary food from Jerry Remy, a chance to mingle with the cast and crew of the film and a screening of the documentary "Down the Line." This was a behind the scenes look at a day in the life of clubhouse employees, managers, grounds crew, bat boys and more.

We watched parts of a few MLB opening day games, sacrificed a Natives Virgin, traded tickets, coached Fran thru her next break up, met new guy Carter and learned all about Rick's ruptured tendon. Then it was off to the Bleacher Bar to disrupt Tonya's and Isabelle's Trivingo Team. 

It was a late and crazy night returning home in a snow storm on Opening Day. What a way to start the 2011 Season!

www.jerryremys.com
item.name: The Unposted Event at Jerry Remy's That Took Place Yesterday
